parameters.name: CurrentConnectionString
parameters.description: The public endpoint of the instance.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: InstanceNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **0**: virtual private cloud (VPC)
*   **1**: classic network
